reviews.review:
A cool follow-up with nice new ideas.

I thought it couldn't get better after "Portal" and really it didn't. I think I expected too much of a second time flying through one portal and coming out the other, or it just might be me.
The story all in all is way longer than the original's - and some might say way better because of more complexity - and had more opportunities for dark humor, but I just felt like it couldn't reach the original.
The new elements are really fun, but also wear off quite quickly - after using the orange gel to boost yourself into a wall where you placed a portal once or twice it becomes a bit boring, atleast to me. What did stay fun in the second is all the portal action, but I also need to critisize even that, because there's a lot more time between the actual puzzles this time - as if somebody was trying to stretch things...
Graphically it isn't stunning but looks better overall than the first one (reflections actually still look quite good) with better textures and higher resolutions.
One thing Portal 2 does really good in my opinion is making you feel lonely. Something about huge chambers with Cave Johnson's voice in your ears makes you feel alone...

Conclusion: very cool game, but play the first one if you haven't already.
Classic game. Way much longer than the first part. One of the best ever made. ‚ô°
Good puzzle game but people overhyped it, 9/10.

Best Puzzle game to play with friends

Me: YESYESYESYESYESYESYESYESYES

Es un juego de muchisima inteligencia. El modo cooperativo es para amigos que comparten tu misma logica y tu misma energia.
You can't go wrong with this game. Everything from the puzzle design, the voice acting, scenery, I can't rate it highly enough.
My personal favorite game of all time. It will be years until another game has such an amazing mix of good gameplay and story.
Este juego es como xiaomi, la mejor calidad precio <3

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games of this decade. Its puzzles, story, just everything about it, they all are amazing. I would kill for a sequel, or even just a mod of the game that continues the story.
Amazing game, unlucky valve don't make a 3rd series of games. Always do community maps once you have done the campaign!

This is a fun game

There's really not much else you need to know before buying it.  its got a solid story line, the puzzles keep you entertained.  The multiplayer is engaging when you can find someone worth playing with.  and when its on sale i'd say its almost worth buying two copies, one for you and one for a friend.

Portal 2 introduces a couple of new game play dynamics into the test chambers. You should complete portal one if you have not done so yet (Portal 2 doesn't require you to complete it), as it is one awesome game and two follows so nicely onto one. Both instalments are funny and entertaining, the puzzles can be on the easy side, however there is one or two tricky times that I had to step away from the game for a minute to just get a fresh perspective (to needlessly not over complicate the solution) and solve it. The credits music is awesome and still one of my favourite parts of these games.

The extra videos are done really cool and you can see the development team just had so much fun making this, I have much more to explore in this game and look forward to playing co-op soon.
